#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int n,k=1,rem,i,sum=0,count=0;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n!=0)
	{
		
		int a[n];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
			sum=sum+a[i];
		}
		rem=sum/n;
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]>rem)
			{
				count=count+a[i]-rem;
			}
		}
		printf("Set #%d\nThe minimum number of moves is %d.\n",k,count);

		count=0;
		sum=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		k++;
	}
	return 0;
}
